text:
Hey Marius, 
2023 is almost over, but there's still a lot you can achieve with Make. You
could try adding the latest AI tools to your workflows. Discover something new
in our growing community. Or shape our product future roadmap. Read on to learn
how you can still power up your year. 
Hey Marius, 
2023 is almost over, but there's still a lot you can achieve with Make. You
could try adding the latest AI tools to your workflows. Discover something new
in our growing community. Or shape our product future roadmap. Read on to learn
how you can still power up your year. 

 
New in Make: The Latest OpenAI Capabilities 
When you combine the power of Make and AI, incredible things become possible.
And our new OpenAI modules bring the latest tools to work with text, images and
audio generation to your scenarios. 
Check them out ➜
 

 
New in Make: The Latest OpenAI Capabilities 
When you combine the power of Make and AI, incredible things become possible.
And our new OpenAI modules bring the latest tools to work with text, images and
audio generation to your scenarios. 
Check them out ➜
 

 
Scenario Inspo: Integrating AI 
From categorizing support tickets to summarizing sales calls, integrating AI
into your apps is an express route to save time and power up your workflows. Get
up to speed in our handy guide. 
Read the blog ➜
 

 
Scenario Inspo: Integrating AI 
From categorizing support tickets to summarizing sales calls, integrating AI
into your apps is an express route to save time and power up your workflows. Get
up to speed in our handy guide. 
Read the blog ➜
 

 
How Much Do Meetings Cost? 
Try building this neat meeting cost calculator in Make, and you’ll know the cost
of your meetings down to the very last cent. The results might just surprise you
- and change your behavior. 
Find out how ➜

Try building this neat meeting cost calculator in Make, and you’ll know the cost
of your meetings down to the very last cent. The results might just surprise you
- and change your behavior. 
Find out how ➜
 

 
Make Community: 10,000 Strong! 
Together, we've hit a major milestone: there are now 10,000 members in the Make
Community! From quick questions to in-depth discussions, thank you for making
the community what it is. 
Read more about the milestone ➜
 

 
Make Community: 10,000 Strong! 
Together, we've hit a major milestone: there are now 10,000 members in the Make
Community! From quick questions to in-depth discussions, thank you for making
the community what it is. 
Read more about the milestone ➜
 

 
 You're invited: Discover the Latest eCommerce Tools with Make 
Supercharge your e-commerce strategy and conquer the busiest retail seasons.
Join our exclusive webinar, discover the potential of our 4-workflow approach,
and transform theory into practice for real-world e-commerce success. 
Save your seat ➜
 

 
 You're invited: Discover the Latest eCommerce Tools with Make 
Supercharge your e-commerce strategy and conquer the busiest retail seasons.
Join our exclusive webinar, discover the potential of our 4-workflow approach,
and transform theory into practice for real-world e-commerce success. 
Save your seat ➜
 

 
Quick Tip: Share Your Ideas, Shape Our Roadmap 
Did you know that you can share your platform and app ideas and vote for the
ones already shared? Sign in with your Make account, share your feedback, check
the status and get notified about the features and apps you like! 
See all ideas ➜
 

 
Quick Tip: Share Your Ideas, Shape Our Roadmap 
Did you know that you can share your platform and app ideas and vote for the
ones already shared? Sign in with your Make account, share your feedback, check
the status and get notified about the features and apps you like! 
See all ideas ➜
